description.compact:
2.2. - Customer
This table shall contain all the existing records operated during the taxation period in the relevant customers’ file, as well as those which may be implicit in the operations and do not exist in the relevant file.

Customer
This table shall contain all the existing records operated during the taxation period in the relevant customers’ file, as well as those which may be implicit in the operations and do not exist in the relevant file.

Gets as customerID
In the list of clients cannot exist more than one registration with the same CustomerID. In the case of final consumers, a generic client with the designation of “Consumidor final” (Final Consumer) shall be created.

Sets a new customerID
In the list of clients cannot exist more than one registration with the same CustomerID. In the case of final consumers, a generic client with the designation of “Consumidor final” (Final Consumer) shall be created.

return.description: true if the value is valid

description.compact:
Gets as customerTaxID
It must be indicated without the country’s prefix.

docblock.description:
The generic client, corresponding to the aforementioned “Consumidor final” (Final consumer) shall be identified with the Tax Identification Number “999999990”.
<xs:element ref="CustomerTaxID"/>
<xs:element name="CustomerTaxID" type="SAFPTtextTypeMandatoryMax30Car"/>

description.compact:
Sets a new customerTaxID
It must be indicated without the country’s prefix.

docblock.description:
The generic client, corresponding to the aforementioned “Consumidor final” (Final consumer) shall be identified with the Tax Identification Number “999999990”.
<xs:element ref="CustomerTaxID"/>
<xs:element name="CustomerTaxID" type="SAFPTtextTypeMandatoryMax30Car"/>

return.description: true if the value is valid

description.compact:
Gets as billingAddress
Head office address or the fixed /permanent establishment address, located on Portuguese territory.
The Address instance will be create once you get this method
<xs:element ref="BillingAddress"/>
<xs:element name="BillingAddress" type="AddressStructure"/>

Adds as shipToAddress
This method every time that is invoked will return a new Instance of 'Address' that shal must be populated with the correct values.
If there is a need to make more than one reference, this structure can be generated as many times as necessary.
<xs:element ref="ShipToAddress" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/>
<xs:element name="ShipToAddress" type="AddressStructure"/>

return.description: The new Address instance that was add and must be populated

description.compact: Create the xml node for Customer
Base class for Customer and supplier

Gets as accountID
The respective current account must be indicated in the general accounting plan, if it is defined. Otherwise the field shall be filled in with the designation “Desconhecido” (Unknown).

docblock.description:
<xs:element ref="AccountID"/>
<xs:element name="AccountID">
     <xs:simpleType>
         <xs:restriction base="xs:string">
             <xs:pattern value="(([^^]*)|Desconhecido)"/>
             <xs:minLength value="1"/>
             <xs:maxLength value="30"/>
         </xs:restriction>
     </xs:simpleType>
 </xs:element>

description.compact:
Sets AccountID
The respective current account must be indicated in the general accounting plan, if it is defined. Otherwise the field shall be filled in with the designation “Desconhecido” (Unknown).

docblock.description:
<xs:element ref="AccountID"/>
<xs:element name="AccountID">
     <xs:simpleType>
         <xs:restriction base="xs:string">
             <xs:pattern value="(([^^]*)|Desconhecido)"/>
             <xs:minLength value="1"/>
             <xs:maxLength value="30"/>
         </xs:restriction>
     </xs:simpleType>
 </xs:element>

return.description: true if the value is valid

description.compact:
Gets as companyName
The generic client/supplier shall be identified with the designation “Consumidor final” (Final Consumer).
<xs:element ref="CompanyName"/>
<xs:element name="CompanyName" type="SAFPTtextTypeMandatoryMax100Car"/>

The generic client/supplier shall be identified with the designation “Consumidor final” (Final Consumer).

<xs:element name="CompanyName" type="SAFPTtextTypeMandatoryMax100Car"/>

return.description: true if the value is valid
